Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A simple prayer to Christ — one quatrain

BodAddB60.Transcription:
Iesu for thy precius blod & thy bitter pascionmake my later
                    endyng good & the childe of saluacoun
BodAddB60.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 337.
Gray,  Douglas. 
             “The Five Wounds of Our Lord.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 10 [208] (1963): 50-51, 82-89, 127-34, 163-8: 128.
